title: Are You Using Your Wrist Rest Wrong?
description: A wrist rest isn't for resting while you type. Learn the correct way to use palm rests to avoid injury.
author: Free Online Typing Team
content:
The Name is Misleading

It should be called a 'palm rest'.

The Rule

Do not rest your wrists on it while typing. This compresses the carpal tunnel. Only rest your palms on it between bursts of typing to relax your shoulders.
